snippet.title: This is Halo: Custom Edition
snippet.description:
Halo: Custom Edition is still very much alive and kicking, and it has evolved to what it is today over the course of the 12 years it has been out. From the critically acclaimed SPV3 campaign mod to Firefight levels, thousands of phenomenal multiplayer maps and even a single player RTS game mode, anything is possible with Halo: Custom Edition, and what was shown in the video can be downloaded RIGHT NOW, with plenty more to come in the near future.

Download Halo Custom Edition NOW: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=410

SUPER IMPORTANT PATCH v1.0.10: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6798

Download Halo Anti Cheat 2 so you can automatically download multiplayer maps and have access to other features: http://198.98.120.174/

Some levels require Open Sauce: https://bitbucket.org/KornnerStudios/opensauce-release/downloads/OpenSauce_Halo1_CE_20150302.msi

YOU CANNOT RUN HALO ANTI CHEAT AND OPENSAUCE AT THE SAME TIME! YOU HAVE TO INSTALL ONE AND UNINSTALL THE OTHER TO PLAY CUSTOM EDITION!

Get the Universal UI: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6952

Music by Jafet Meza: https://www.youtube.com/user/Jafetator

Tracks: Slipspace Trajectory and Rock Anthem Evolved

Levels shown in order: 

SPV3 (requires OpenSauce): https://www.reddit.com/r/halospv3/comments/4pqwor/spv300_released_download_in_here/

Mystic: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2192

Portent: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=1796

Firefight: Sector 09 (requires OpenSauce): http://haloce3.com/downloads/singleplayer/original-singleplayer/firefight-sector-09/?_sft_category=modified-singleplayer,original-singleplayer

Bigass Final: http://haloce3.com/downloads/multiplayer/original-multiplayer/bigass/

Extinction: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2040

The Silent Cartographer Evolved Multiplayer: http://haloce3.com/downloads/multiplayer/original-multiplayer/tsce_multiplayerv1/

Dredworks PB2 (Aerial): http://haloce3.com/downloads/multiplayer/original-multiplayer/dredwerkz_pb2/

[H2] Ascension: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=4881

Immure: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=1278

BK-G3-Augur: http://haloce3.com/downloads/multiplayer/modified-multiplayer/bk-g3-augur/?_sft_category=modified-multiplayer

DSMT Dreamtrap: http://haloce3.com/downloads/multiplayer/original-multiplayer/dsmt_dreamtrap_modern/?_sft_category=modified-multiplayer,original-multiplayer,multiplayer-ai

Gruntground: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=5946

Bigass Final

Rainbow Road: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=2505

Starwars Beta 904: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6745

SPV3 (requires OpenSauce)

Project Lumoria: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6507

Firefight: Sector 09 (requires OpenSauce)

Takedown Project Lawson (requires OpenSauce):http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=7088

Coldsnap: http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=1770

Battle Creek and Death Island with the Halo Anniversary graphics mod: https://www.mediafire.com/folder/cyswouggm5dw9/HCEA_2.2

Strategy Demo Test Map: https://www.dropbox.com/sh/3wp3v54m3hold3u/AACJrtoKSHZo0280Dtc6TYaIa/Test%20maps?dl=0

Firefight: Descent http://hce.halomaps.org/index.cfm?fid=6463

SPV3 (requires OpenSauce)

Extinction
